nawa mangakata fen shuyi - 7oba niyojanaya karana me sathun 12 dena atharin bheda, gatalu, wiruddhawadikam athi karawana sathun dolos denaku atha.me anuwa miyage wiruddhawadiya ashwaya wana athara ashwayage wiruddhawadiya miya we.mema sathun athara bhedayan nathinam wiruddhawadikam hata gaththe ada eeye nowana bawath ee pilibandawa sandahan wana china kathawa pasugiya sathiye kiyawimen obata awabodha wannata athi.miyage  wiruddhawadiya ashwaya ashwayage wiruddhawadiya  miya gawayage wiruddhawadiya bataluwa bataluwage wiruddhawadiya gawaya kotiyage wiruddhawadiya wandura wandurage wiruddhawadiya  kotiya hawage wiruddhawadiya kukula kukulage wiruddhawadiya hawa makarage wiruddhawadiya sunakhaya sunakhayage wiruddhawadiya makara nayage wiruddhawadiya uura uurage wiruddhawadiya nayaapa manushyayan lesa melowata bihiwi sitiyath dharmaya manawa watahagena dharmanukulawa jiwath nowana thak apa manushyayan nowa saththwa bhutha kotasak pamani.enisama apa upan wasarata ayath sanketha saththwaya thula thibena honda ho naraka gathi guna apa thula da esema pawathi.ema saththwa gathiguna apagen duras wi apa manushyayan bawata pathwanuye dharmaya haraha pamani.
